languages: Understands common and draconic but can't speak

abilities.name: Damage Immunities
abilities.description: Lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilities.name: Condition Immunities
abilities.description: Charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

abilities.name: Beserk
abilities.description:
Whenever the golem starts its turn with 26 or fewer hit points, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. While beserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see each turn. If no creature is near enough, it attacks an object, favoring objects smaller than itself. It remains berserk until it is destroyed or regains all of its hit points.
The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the beserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases to be beserk. If it takes damage again while still at 26 hit points or fewer, the golem might go beserk again.

abilities.name: Aversion of Fire
abilities.description: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its turn.

abilities.name: Immutable Form
abilities.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form

abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
abilities.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

abilities.name: Magic Weapons
abilities.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical

name: Skaab (Kobold)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The skaab makes two attacks, which can be any combination of claw or tail attacks

actions.name: Claw
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target
Hit: 2d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage

actions.name: Tail
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target
Hit: 2d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage
